snippet.title: Omni Charlotte Hotel
snippet.description: A favorite luxury hotel in Charlotte, the Omni is in a great Uptown location. It provides parents with safety products like outlet covers and nightlights, as well as a goody bag and a suitcase filled with games and book...

snippet.title: Hotel le Dauphin
snippet.description: In a city whose hotels are often exceed family budgets, the brand-new, super clean Hotel le Dauphin is a find. Located close to Old Montreal, it has comfortable beds, an ultra-modern bathroom with a space-age shower des...

snippet.title: The Peery Hotel
snippet.description: Families enjoy staying at this historic hotel and eating at its two great on-site restaurants. The oldest hotel in the city, the 1910 architectural charm and friendly staff make it a first pick in a convenient downtown ...

snippet.title: Little America Hotel
snippet.description: There's nothing little about this 849-room hotel with one of the biggest indoor-outdoor pools in the city and kid-friendly, nearly soundproof walls. It's a great choice for families on a tighter budget....

snippet.title: Music Review: Hotel Paper
snippet.description: Sweet, well-produced CD could use a shot of fun.

snippet.title: El Tovar
snippet.description: Yes, it's a splurge for park dining, but it's worth it for the chance to enjoy the stately elegance of this historic hotel. Kids' meals are well-priced, and parents...

snippet.title: Hilton Branson Convention Center
snippet.description: This downtown (and therefore away from the strip) hotel is a lush escape in the heart of the city that's well suited to traveling families. It features two sprawling pools that are open late -- one indoor, one outdoor -...
